wikipedia_page.main: Bethany Shriever  (born 19 April 1999) is an elite British cyclist, competing as a BMX racer. A World Junior champion in 2017, and winner of the UCI BMX Supercross World Cup final event in Zolder in 2018, in 2021 she became the first British BMX racing cyclist in history to win both the Olympic and World titles in the same year.
